channel.title: Penn State University (R-002)
channel.generator: Function write_rss() in R package nrcadams

item.title: Discusses review of of Pennsylvania State Univ Research Reactor during ACRS 12th meeting on 550506.Recommends that Penn State be permitted to carry out program proposed.
item.author: NRC ADVISORY COMMITTEE ON REACTOR SAFEGUARDS (ACRS)

item.title: Details minor changes & related safety evaluation made to facility during 1978.Aluminum pneumatic sys installed on 780116 & stainless steel pneumatic transfer sys installed on 780215.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION TO NRC, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: PENNSYLVANIA STATE UNIV., UNIVERSITY PARK, PA
